strapiPost.title: Northwest Arkansas Tourism Nominated For Multiple Awards
strapiPost.content:
Multiple attractions and groups from Northwest Arkansas have been nominated for Henry Awards, statewide awards given to those who have made significant contributions to the state's tourism industry.

  • Places of innovation: The Railyard Park & Butterfield Stage of Rogers and Experience Fayetteville's ArtCourt have both been nominated for The Natural State Tourism Development Award for creatively increasing community engagement. 
  • People of interest: Experience Fayetteville has been nominated for the Tourism Organization of the Year, and Luke Wiggins of Visit Rogers has been selected as a Rising Star for demonstrating leadership and commitment to the state's tourism industry.

Read more on the story HERE.
